short_description: Master iconic fighters or discover new rivals! Experience a revolutionary fighting system with Drive Gauge mechanics, engaging single-player modes, and online battles.
Bounty hunt in Louisiana swamps. Fight horrific creatures and rival hunters for rewards. Intense, gritty PvPvE experience.
Explore a vast open world, battle ferocious enemies, and unravel the mysteries of the world. Collect powerful resonators and discover secrets.
Survive the Cold War on Everon. Fight as US or Soviet forces in intense tactical combat, managing supplies and teamwork for victory.
Scavenge abandoned moons for scrap. Sell to a corporation, meet quota, and survive the horrors lurking in the darkness.

Description:
Enter the Dark Zone, raid for loot, and fight for survival. Realistic gunplay and intense, extraction-based combat await. Gear up and get out!
Explore a post-apocalyptic metropolis fighting Ethereal threats. Control unique agents in fast-paced, stylish action combat.
Survive a prehistoric world. Tame dinosaurs, build bases, and fight for dominance. Explore, craft, and uncover the island's mysteries.
Build an empire, research technologies, wage war, and explore a vast world. Lead your civilization through history and achieve ultimate victory.
Fast-paced, objective-based team combat. Battle as mythological gods in a third-person perspective MOBA. Customize your abilities and dominate the arena!
Explore a vast open world, engage in dynamic battles, and shape the realm through player choices. Unite with allies to conquer formidable foes.
Survive, craft, and build in a fallen world. Explore a vast, shrouded land, fight formidable foes, and reclaim what was lost.
Explore a mysterious toy factory, solve puzzles, and survive terrifying, living toys. Frightening secrets await discovery.
Embark on a co-op adventure. Solve puzzles, master unique character abilities, and experience a heartfelt story about love and reconciliation.
Fight through massive armies as a powerful warrior! Experience thrilling, fast-paced action with iconic characters and devastating combos. Conquer ancient China!
Experience refined puck control, enhanced player AI, and immersive game modes. Dominate the ice with seamless skating and strategic team play.
Construct poker hands, optimize jokers, and battle escalating blinds. A roguelike deckbuilder where strategic card combinations are key to victory.

Description:
Gather resources, build your island, and battle mischievous creatures. Explore a vibrant world, uncover secrets, and conquer the unknown!
Explore a vibrant world as a pactbearer! Command allies in strategic battles, forge bonds, and alter destiny through impactful choices in this JRPG.

game_title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle
short_description: The whip-cracking archaeologist races across the globe, solving puzzles and battling Nazis in a thrilling first-person adventure.
Brutal 50v50 WWII battles. Authentic weaponry, intense squad-based combat, and strategic resource management on massive maps. Communicate or die.
Leap, bound, and swim through colorful worlds! Collect stars, defeat Bowser, and rescue Princess Peach. Explore vast 3D environments and enjoy classic platforming fun.
Explore a vast, hostile open world. Survive anomalies, scavenge for resources, and unravel the Zone's mysteries. Fight mutants and rival factions.
Survive the Zone. Explore anomalies, scavenge for gear, and fight rival factions in a harsh, post-apocalyptic world. PvP and PvE blended.

Description:
Team up with friends and tackle chaotic grocery shopping! Fill your cart, survive crazy challenges, and race to the checkout.
Explore a vibrant world! Engage in thrilling combat, level up your character, and team up with others to conquer challenging dungeons.
Brutal survival horror! Face terrifying trials alone or in co-op. Experiment, escape, and endure grotesque psychological manipulation to survive.
Navigate a near-future Detroit, making choices that shape the android revolution. Experience branching narratives with impactful consequences, playing as three distinct androids.
Experience authentic MMA action! Master striking, grappling, and submissions. Build your career, compete online, and feel the intensity of the Octagon.
Cultivate your farm, befriend villagers, and unravel mysteries in a vibrant, shared-world community sim. Explore, craft, and decorate!
Survive the Amazon rainforest. Craft, hunt, and build to stay alive. Sanity is as crucial as your hunger and thirst. Fight to live.
Experience stunning realism across diverse landscapes. Pilot various aircraft, conquer challenges, and explore a living, breathing world.
Assemble powerful teams, strategize item placement, and outwit opponents in this auto-battler experience. Last team standing wins!
Explore a vast, procedurally generated universe. Discover planets, build bases, fight enemies, and trade resources to survive.
Cultivate diverse crops and raise livestock. Manage your farm, expand your operations, and enjoy a vast, immersive agricultural experience.
Team up to reclaim Washington D.C. from hostile factions. Explore a dynamic open world, customize your agent, and engage in intense tactical combat.
Fight against friends in chaotic battles! Choose from iconic characters, master unique movesets, and knock opponents off-stage for victory!
Survive a zombie apocalypse in an open world. Parkour across rooftops, craft weapons, and fight hordes. Day brings hope, night... terror.
Stealth through Nazi-occupied France. Utilize realistic ballistics and environmental takedowns. Experience intense sniping action and brutal X-ray kills.
Explore a mystical island, battling supernatural creatures, crafting powerful gear, and vying for control in a dynamic, player-driven world.
Explore a vibrant island, make friends, craft, decorate, and uncover mysteries with adorable characters! Build your dream getaway!
Command a squad of aspiring musical artists, strategizing gigs, managing relationships, and climbing the charts to become the ultimate act.
Engage in intense 7v7 tank battles! Command diverse armored vehicles, master tactical maneuvers, and dominate the battlefield through strategic teamwork.
A roguelike twin-stick shooter with challenging, procedurally generated dungeons. Collect bizarre items and defeat grotesque bosses. Embrace the unsettling.
Survive a dynamic open world ravaged by cataclysm. Scavenge, craft, and fight for dominance in a hazardous environment against both nature and rival factions.
Explore a sprawling open world. Engage in heists, street races, and gang warfare. Customize vehicles and build your criminal empire.
Embark on stylish adventures! Dress up Nikki, explore fantastical worlds, and complete challenges using fashion. Collect stunning outfits!
Blast through mayhem with Vault Hunters! Loot relentlessly, fight psychos, and save the galaxy from the Calypso Twins.

Description:
Embark on epic quests, conquer formidable foes, and forge alliances. Experience intense PvP battles and dominate the battlefield in this MMORPG.
Manage your own store! Stock shelves, handle finances, and build your grocery empire. Can you keep customers happy and profits high?
